messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Spam! Spam! was This Site Has Super Savings & Great ...
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks, Rhonda! Well just might work.  After all, it s at least as expressive as mil s oh   It s really only first 8 days until Gary arrives that worry me.
messages.messageBody:
Thanks, Rhonda! Well just might work. After all, it's at least as expressive as mil's "oh" It's really only first 8 days until Gary arrives that worry me. All in all, they're great parents and she was a huge help when I was on bedrest before Dan's birth. Of course, that was before I lost my mind and kept the boys home from school!

Syl


++++++++++++++

Rhonda - Who just thought of something else you could tell your in-laws...For
the bargain price of getting my hiney to Hawaii, I'd be happy to answer each
of their questions....well. LOL




---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
The New Yahoo! Search - Faster. Easier. Bingo.

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Spam! Spam! was This Site Has Super Savings & Great ...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/23/03 9:33:54 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... Syl, You poor soul. I was just thinking of responses to each of those questions and came up
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/23/03 9:33:54 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
syltoyama@... writes:

> Stuff like.... how is Andy doing in his lessons? What does he read? Does
> he do Math? Does he have friends? What are his regular chores at your house,
> and what chores would he like here? Wouldn't you like for Daniel to sleep
> somewhere other than your bed? Doesn't Dan bite when he nurses? Doesn't Andy
> ever eat vegies or meat? Daniel doesn't drink regular milk? And virtually
> all my replies are met with, "oh...." and a look that says she can't even begin
> to understand us and our choices.
>

Syl,

You poor soul. I was just thinking of responses to each of those questions
and came up with one word you could use for each one.....well. The word well,
can be a statement, a question, or in contemplation of ones thoughts. So if for
every question they ask, what if all you answered with was....well? You could
even say it and nod your head depending on the question and simply answer
with the retorical ...well.

Just a thought.

Try to have fun in paradise anyway, I'm still jealous....

Rhonda - Who just thought of something else you could tell your in-laws...For
the bargain price of getting my hiney to Hawaii, I'd be happy to answer each
of their questions....well. LOL


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Spam! Spam! was This Site Has Super Savings & Great ...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/23/03 7:48:21 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... Syl, Have any room in one of the bags for me?  OMG, I am SO jealous!!! Although I searched and
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/23/03 7:48:21 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
syltoyama@... writes:

> just random thoughts as I began my mental packing for summer at the
> inlaws.......
>

Syl,

Have any room in one of the bags for me? OMG, I am SO jealous!!! Although I
searched and searched for plane tickets to go to the conference, it's just not
gonna happen this year. Believe it or not it's way cheaper for us to fly to
Hawaii. I'm not going there either, but I was shocked at the difference in
fares.

Have a great summer in paradise!!!!

Rhonda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
